sub_title: Purposeful Marketing at Tover | Brand Management | Warm Technology | B2C & B2B2C | MBA
summary:
Hi, I'm Bruno! 🙋🏻‍♂‍ Welcome to my profile. Want to learn more about me? Please read further :)

𝗠𝗬 𝗪𝗛𝗬 💡
I dream of a better world with no poverty nor inequalities, triggered by inclusive and responsible economic growth. In line with that, my life purpose is to drive changes that matter, generating positive impact on whomever I interact with. When making decisions, I like taking into consideration the future of our society and the world we and our future generations will still live in; and during the journey, I will always promote a fun environment.

𝗪𝗛𝗢 𝗜 𝗔𝗠 🧔🏻‍♂️
♦ MBA with over 15 years of B2C & B2B2C International Marketing experience, specialized in the development and implementation of customer-centric (branded) marketing strategies and plans
♦ Passion for driving change via challenging the status-quo throughout the customer decision journey, delivering projects and campaigns that build brand equity and support market penetration & lead generation
♦ Love co-creating relevant solutions together with internal and external stakeholders, supporting my decisions in data analytics
♦ Native Spanish speaker, full professional proficiency in English en ik ben Nederlands aan het leren, to fully embrace my recently acquired Dutch citizenship


Even though I'm currently Dutch, I was born and raised in Peru, a Latin-American developing country, so I understand the real pain of poverty and inequalities. I’ve been nurturing my journey with experiences that allow me to fulfill my life purpose. 

COVID-19 pandemic gave me the gift of time to reflect and realize that there was still a lot more that I could do to become a real agent of change and generate positive impact. In that sense, I joined Tover to support its purpose of creating a more caring and inclusive world for people with cognitive challenges. 


➡️ Does anything about the previous resonate with you?
➡️ Do you want to chat about something that could be of our mutual interest? 
➡️ Or is there a topic that you think we might have a different point of view? 
↪️ 𝙁𝙚𝙚𝙡 𝙛𝙧𝙚𝙚 𝙩𝙤 𝙧𝙚𝙖𝙘𝙝 𝙤𝙪𝙩! 𝙄'𝙢 𝙖𝙡𝙬𝙖𝙮𝙨 𝙪𝙥 𝙛𝙤𝙧 𝙤𝙥𝙚𝙣 𝙙𝙞𝙨𝙘𝙪𝙨𝙨𝙞𝙤𝙣𝙨 ;)



Purpose | Diversity & Inclusion - D&I | Marketing communications | Brand | International | Strategy | Hands-on | Product innovation | Project management | Stakeholder management | Communities | Systems thinking | Ecosystem | Intrapreneurship | Data-driven | Triple bottom line | UN Sustainable Development Goals | Circular economy | ESG | Regeneration | Resilience | Social enterprise | MBA | Positive psychology | Mindfulness

treasury_media.title: DEVOPS AGILE SKILLS ASSOCIATION (DASA) CONTINUES EXPLOSIVE, WORLDWIDE GROWTH
treasury_media.description:
Featured note in which I reflect on how our DASA Ambassador and Influencer programs go from strength to strength as DevOps thought leaders, consultants, practitioners and subject matter experts become passionate and committed participants of DevOps Agile Skills Association (DASA)'s growing community. 

#goDASA #devops #community #talenttransformation #peoplereadiness

treasury_media.title: We've won International Professional 'Chapter of the Year'! - Net Impact Amsterdam
treasury_media.description: Each year Net Impact celebrates local chapters that have gone above and beyond to enable a positive difference in the world. This year, we were one of them!

treasury_media.title: I WILL video (RSM full-time MBA 2017)
treasury_media.description:
💡 This experience triggered the journey towards identifying my life purpose.
Filming this video was the result of putting into practice all the tools and best practices learnt in the Presentation and Communication Performance course. 
Looking at the final result, I feel proud of the decisions I made, including having taken the course at the beginning of the MBA program.

projects.title: Vivinal® Milk Fat – from features to value
projects.description:
Development of the new value proposition of Vivinal® Milk Fat, the main component of Infant Formulas (IF), Follow-on Formulas (FOF) and Growing-up Milk (GUM). 
Based on current consumer and customer needs (following a B2B2C approach), and translated into relevant benefits, the project delivered two refreshed and actionable proposals - one for Europe and another for the Asian market.

profile_positions.description:
♦ Developing and executing go-to-market strategy of new products and services to maximize impact of company’s flagship - Tovertafel - across target audiences
♦ Driving growth of warm technology for the care of elderly people living with dementia via brand awareness and thought leadership activations in all markets where Tover portfolio is present (via distribution partners)
♦ Nurturing innovation pipeline, representing Marketing within Seniors’ SteerCo

---
At Tover 💛, our collective goal is to create a more caring and inclusive world for people with cognitive challenges. Together with care professionals, we strive to provide products and services that are designed around memorable moments that positively influence quality of life. Via our serious games, we are playing for a better existence. That’s what we call ‘purposeful play’.

▶️ For a glimpse of what we do, please watch the enclosed videos. And for more information, visit www.tover.care or feel free to PM me 🙂
profile_positions.title: Brand Manager, Seniors

profile_positions.description:
> Led the co-creation of shared value within global DASA ecosystem, supporting mission to become companies' key partner in their DevOps transformation journeys
♦ Increased 20%+ number of volunteers forming part of DASA Ambassador and DASA Influencer programs
♦ Revamped DASA Enterprise Leadership Forum and developed new DevOps Coaches community to generate member leads and promote DASA advanced certifications
♦ Co-developed Chapter and Circle community models and attracted DevOps professionals to join DASA Working Groups
profile_positions.title: Community Engagement Manager

profile_positions.description:
> I joined this social fintech start-up that aims to reinvent traditional gifting via an app that enables giving cash with a purpose, in a fun and personal way, without waste and hassle
> A 3-month pro-bono assignment during the minimum viable product (MVP) stage, whose main deliverables were:
♦ Extensive competitive analysis, incl. key learnings & recommendations from relevant benchmark, complemented with a spreadsheet for future tracking
♦ Proposal for Balanced Scorecard, with special focus on Impact KPIs, to support company's value proposition towards (prospect) users and investors
♦ Suggestion of updated Content Strategy Framework, incl. specific content ideas for intermediate phase (prior to main campaign to be delivered by agency)
♦ Best practices for video explainers and storyboard of 4 explainers for key customer journey moments
♦ Document with actionable recommendations for Boon & Bliss current and later stages
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Assignment

profile_positions.description:

profile_positions.description:

internal and external stakeholders
♦ Led process of creation, launched, and managed company's new B2B umbrella brand: “Alicorp Soluciones” (Alicorp Solutions), unifying four Business Units and over 30 brands under this new identity

volunteer_experiences.description: After participating as a mentee in the Mentorship Programme's first edition facilitated by Net Impact Amsterdam and being grateful for the benefits I've got from it, I decided to give back to this community by taking part in its following editions - this time as a mentor.

company.name: Rotterdam School of Management, Erasmus University

volunteer_experiences.description:
As RSM, Erasmus University proud alumnus, via the School's "MentorMe" programme, I support current students who approach for having career conversations and getting some feedback around their job search process.
> Profile: https://rsm.firsthand.co/app#!/profile/6883532

Digital volunteering as part as Crea+ 10th anniversary celebration. 
The main goal was to provide with tablets to students who otherwise would not have been able to continue studying remotely during Peruvian's COVID-19 first wave.

Crea+ is a Latin American professional volunteering organization that promotes individual social responsibility via Education. Its purpose is that more children and adolescents believe in themselves to achieve their dreams.
As a math teacher of different grades at schools in vulnerable areas of Peru, in addition to my participation in the Marketing team of the organization, my main objective was to educate in values, develop capacities and empower talents.

HH is a youth movement established in 1926 with head offices in Israel. Its main objective is personal materialization, and sees Judaism as the source of national, social and moral values that preserve the integrity and continuity of the Jewish people.
During my participation as a guide, I was in charge of three different groups of teenagers, to whom via a ludic methodology, my aim was to educate with values.
